title: Ticket #1081: DAGMan PRE and POST script arguments cannot contain spaces
description:
Because of the way DAGMan parses PRE and POST script arguments, it's not possible to have a space in a PRE or POST script argument (the arguments are space-delimited, and there's no quoting or escaping...).

Oh, yeah -- a note on the version info above: I'll bet this bug has existed since the very beginning of PRE and POST scripts in DAGs...
